```py
target-version = "py311"

]

[lint.pydocstyle]
```

```py
- repo: https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit
  # Ruff version.
  rev: v0.1.5
  hooks:
    # Run the linter.
    - id: ruff
      args: [ --fix ]
    # Run the formatter.
    - id: ruff-format
```

